amendment.description: At the end of title IV, add the following new section: SEC. 407. CONSTRUCTION OF ACT ON COMPETITION REQUIREMENTS FOR THE ACQUISITION OF SERVICES. Nothing in this Act or the amendments made by this Act shall be construed to affect the competition requirements of section 2304 of title 10, United States Code, with respect to the acquisition of services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-467 to provide that nothing in the Act or amendments made by it shall be construed to affect the competition requirements of 10 U.S.C. 2304 (contract competition requirements).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
